amendment.description: An amendment numbered 115 printed in Part A of House Report 119-199 to strike funding to support the armed forces of Jordan.
amendment.purpose: Amendment sought to strike funding to support the armed forces of Jordan.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Greene (GA) amendment (A014) Failed by recorded vote: 30 - 400 (Roll no. 208).

action.text: House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Greene (GA) amendment (A014) Failed by recorded vote: 30 - 400 (Roll no. 208).
